name: Slayer Bird vs Crappy Zombies
description:
You call yourself a Flappy Bird Ninja? If so, try to beat the current high score 57 in this game.

HEAD SETS (EAR PHONES) ARE RECOMMENDED WHILE PLAYING.

This game has the same tap logic to shoot the zombies with awesome effects.

Shoot all Zombies with Taps.
Don't let the civilians the to be eaten by them.
And never shoot civilians.

Earn Different Jewels as you slaughter more & more zombies.
Compare and Compete in Game Centre.

For more games follow: https://twitter.com/AriyalionGames
